Data.Name: End
Data.Description: Both objects are where they are supposed to be.

Data.Name: Snap Objects
Data.Description: One of the objects has to be brought to its position.

Text.defaultText: Snap the objects to the respective snap zones. You can do this in any order.

Data.Name: Snap Cube
Data.Description: Now the cube has to be put in position.

Text.defaultText: The sphere is in place! Now snap the cube.

Data.Name: Snap Sphere
Data.Description: Now the sphere has to be put in position.

Text.defaultText: The cube is in place! Now snap the sphere.
